kw.name: Send Short Message Through Slack And Email
Run Process

suite.doc: Part Two of the Python Library example has been enhanced by using the SharedKeywordsAndListeners.robot resource file to add 2 types of Robot Framework listeners and a team notification keyword. Also added the "--randomize all" option in the commands-running-inside-a-docker-container.sh script, and will demonstrate the use of the "--rerunfailedsuites".

suite.doc: Part Two of the Python Library example has been enhanced by using the SharedKeywordsAndListeners.robot resource file to add 2 types of Robot Framework listeners and a team notification keyword. Also added the "--randomize all" option in the commands-running-inside-a-docker-container.sh script, and will demonstrate the use of the "--rerunfailedsuites" option.

stat.name: Robot Framework test run with user-created Python Library one test at a time in serial random order
